alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 11:58AM MST until February 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 AM Thursday to Noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains
